subject: Inital state - dbus API initialization.
commitMessage:
Inital state - dbus API initialization.

This part adds InitialState. Used mainly to initialize dbus
interfaces (properties and methods) for both Legacy and Proxy nodes.

Tested:
DBus tree is initialized, all properties have initial content, methods
are callable.
> busctl tree xyz.openbmc_project.VirtualMedia
└─/xyz
  └─/xyz/openbmc_project
    └─/xyz/openbmc_project/VirtualMedia
      ├─/xyz/openbmc_project/VirtualMedia/Legacy
      │ ├─/xyz/openbmc_project/VirtualMedia/Legacy/Slot_2
      │ └─/xyz/openbmc_project/VirtualMedia/Legacy/Slot_3
      └─/xyz/openbmc_project/VirtualMedia/Proxy
        ├─/xyz/openbmc_project/VirtualMedia/Proxy/Slot_0
        └─/xyz/openbmc_project/VirtualMedia/Proxy/Slot_1

> busctl introspect  xyz.openbmc_project.VirtualMedia  /xyz/openbmc_project/VirtualMedia/Proxy/Slot_0
NAME                                        TYPE      SIGNATURE RESULT/VALUE                   FLAGS
org.freedesktop.DBus.Introspectable         interface -         -                              -
.Introspect                                 method    -         s                              -
org.freedesktop.DBus.Peer                   interface -         -                              -
.GetMachineId                               method    -         s                              -
.Ping                                       method    -         -                              -
org.freedesktop.DBus.Properties             interface -         -                              -
.Get                                        method    ss        v                              -
.GetAll                                     method    s         a{sv}                          -
.Set                                        method    ssv       -                              -
.PropertiesChanged                          signal    sa{sv}as  -                              -
xyz.openbmc_project.VirtualMedia.MountPoint interface -         -                              -
.Device                                     property  s         "nbd0"                         emits-change
.EndpointId                                 property  s         "/nbd/0"                       emits-change
.ImageURL                                   property  s         ""                             emits-change writable
.RemainingInactivityTimeout                 property  i         0                              emits-change writable
.Socket                                     property  s         "/run/virtual-media/nbd0.sock" emits-change
.Timeout                                    property  i         30                             emits-change
.WriteProtected                             property  b         true                           emits-change writable
xyz.openbmc_project.VirtualMedia.Process    interface -         -                              -
.Active                                     property  b         false                          emits-change writable
.ExitCode                                   property  i         -1                             emits-change writable
xyz.openbmc_project.VirtualMedia.Proxy      interface -         -                              -
.Mount                                      method    -         b                              -
.Unmount                                    method    -         b                              -
.Completion                                 signal    i         -                              -

Change-Id: Ic63874c6fcf8a70ff9f2a08a8f493ea0ea5c005a
Signed-off-by: Przemyslaw Czarnowski <przemyslaw.hawrylewicz.czarnowski@intel.com>
